Corn_Corn___Common_Rust.remedy: Apply fungicides such as azoxystrobin or pyraclostrobin. Rotate crops and remove infected debris.
Corn_Corn___Common_Rust.prevention: Plant resistant corn varieties and ensure proper field sanitation.

Corn_Corn___Gray_Leaf_Spot.remedy: Use fungicides like strobilurins or triazoles when symptoms first appear.
Corn_Corn___Gray_Leaf_Spot.prevention: Avoid continuous corn planting, use crop rotation, and select resistant hybrids.

Corn_Corn___Healthy.prevention: Maintain good soil fertility and irrigation practices.

Corn_Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight.remedy: Apply fungicides such as mancozeb or copper oxychloride.
Corn_Corn___Northern_Leaf_Blight.prevention: Plant resistant varieties and practice crop rotation.

Potato_Potato___Early_Blight.remedy: Use fungicides like chlorothalonil or mancozeb.
Potato_Potato___Early_Blight.prevention: Remove infected leaves and avoid overhead irrigation.

Potato_Potato___Healthy.prevention: Maintain proper soil and water management.

Potato_Potato___Late_Blight.remedy: Apply systemic fungicides such as metalaxyl.
Potato_Potato___Late_Blight.prevention: Plant certified disease-free tubers and destroy volunteer potatoes.

Rice_Rice___Brown_Spot.remedy: Apply fungicides like carbendazim or tricyclazole.
Rice_Rice___Brown_Spot.prevention: Maintain balanced soil nutrients and proper spacing.

Rice_Rice___Healthy.prevention: Ensure good water and nutrient management.

Rice_Rice___Leaf_Blast.prevention: Avoid excessive nitrogen use and use resistant varieties.

Rice_Rice___Neck_Blast.remedy: Spray fungicides at the booting stage (e.g., tricyclazole).
Rice_Rice___Neck_Blast.prevention: Grow resistant varieties and balance fertilizer use.

sugarcane_Bacterial Blight.prevention: Plant resistant varieties and avoid waterlogging.

sugarcane_Healthy.prevention: Maintain proper irrigation and soil health.

sugarcane_Red Rot.remedy: Rogue diseased clumps and treat soil with lime.
sugarcane_Red Rot.prevention: Use resistant varieties and avoid ratooning in infected fields.

Wheat_Wheat___Brown_Rust.remedy: Spray fungicides like propiconazole or tebuconazole.
Wheat_Wheat___Brown_Rust.prevention: Plant resistant varieties and rotate crops.

Wheat_Wheat___Healthy.prevention: Maintain good field hygiene and proper fertilization.

Wheat_Wheat___Yellow_Rust.remedy: Use fungicides such as triadimefon or propiconazole.
Wheat_Wheat___Yellow_Rust.prevention: Plant resistant wheat varieties and avoid early sowing.
